rationale: Flashback Data Archive requires a license for Oracle Advanced Compression to use.
recommended_action:
Use the "No OPTIMIZE DATA" option when using "CREATE FLASHBACK ARCHIVE".  To disable it after the fact use "ALTER FLASHBACK ARICHIVE" with the "NO OPTIMIZE DATA" option.
Do not use the Flashback Data Archive feature at all in versions 11.2.0.3 and prior if you are not licensed for Advanced Compression
error_message: Flashback Data Archive is listed as a feature usage concern under Oracle Advanced Compression
